dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4956 IH: Commission of Fine Arts District of Columbia Residency Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to require a majority of the members of the Commission of Fine Arts to be residents of the District of Columbia.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Commission of Fine Arts District of Columbia Residency Act.

section.header: Requiring majority of members of Commission of Fine Arts to be District of Columbia residents

subsection.text: Section 9101(b) of title 40, United States Code, is amended by striking appointed by the President, who serve and inserting a majority of whom are residents of the District of Columbia, who shall be appointed by the President to serve.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall take effect upon the expiration of the 1-year period which begins on the date of the enactment of this Act.
